nodes.text: The Suolriep sector, also known as sector J-19, was a sector in the galaxy. It was full of barren planets and contained the Saleucami system.
During the Clone Wars, several battles took place in the sector: the capture of Eeth Koth and subsequent Battle of Saleucami, as well as the Siege of Saleucami during the Outer Rim Sieges.
In the first days of the Galactic Empire, the fugitive Clone Force 99 set a course for the sector after escaping Kamino, as they knew someone there that could potenially help them.
